courses.title: Intro to Computer Science & Programming
outcomes: Write working code in Python & C++
Track versions with Git, document code

courses.title: Calculus I & Mathematical Reasoning
outcomes: Compute limits and basic derivatives & integrals
Prove simple results by induction or contradiction
Translate word problems into mathematical statements

courses.title: First‑Year Seminar: Ethics & Computing
outcomes: Argue ethical trade-offs through structured debate
Reflect publicly, in brief essays or presentations

project: Build a terminal-based calculator or data logger; push code on GitHub, include README and test cases
